title: Walsall
summary: Walsall (/ˈwɔːlsɔːl/ (listen), or /ˈwɒlsɔːl/; locally /ˈwɔːrsʌl/) is a market town and administrative centre in West Midlands County, England. Historically part of Staffordshire, it is located 9 miles (14 km) north-west of Birmingham, 7 miles (11 km) east of Wolverhampton and 9 miles (14 km) from Lichfield.
